noun.description: The quality of having a level surface without raised areas or indentations.
examples: the flatness of the external surface
make sure that the paper is of uniform flatness

noun.description: Lack of emotion or enthusiasm; dullness.
examples: neither the editing nor the score do much to help the film's emotional flatness
there's no escaping the flatness of the characters

noun.description: Loss of effervescence in a sparkling drink.
The quality of a musical sound being below normal pitch.
